column2: The Shapiro delay is estimated using the traditional Mcomp and sini parametrization.
column3: The Shapiro delay is estimated using the traditional Mcomp and sini parametrization.
column4: Three different piece-wise DMX models were employed in the analysis of Fonseca et al. 2021 and the averaged mass from these 3 analyses was reported.

column2: The estimation of the post-Keplerian parameters and Shapiro delay were done assuming general relativity as the theory of gravitation.
column3: The estimation of the post-Keplerian parameters and Shapiro delay were done assuming general relativity as the theory of gravitation.
